turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello! how may i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna's, please. Can you help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that sounds great. Sure, i can definitely help. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order four small pizzas? One pizza meat lovers, another pizza vegetable, the third pizza, can I get mushrooms only? And a fourth pizza Hawaiian with ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want regular crust on all of those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you put thick crust on all four of them, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so u want 4 small pizzas all with thick crust, 1 meat lovers, 1 veggie lovers, 1 with mushrooms, and 1 hawaiian, with ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $49.20 is the total. Should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. The order has been placed. It'll be ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. No, that's about it. Thank you very much.
